code_SemperKI.connections.content.abstractInterface¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2024

Contains: Abstract interface for content of session and database

Classes¶

AbstractContentInterface

Abstract class with functions that session and postgres interfaces have to comply to

Module Contents¶

class code_SemperKI.connections.content.abstractInterface.AbstractContentInterface¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract class with functions that session and postgres interfaces have to comply to

  • projectID (str) – The ID of the project

  • client (str) – anonymous client, necessary for interface

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

None

Parameters:

Return type:

abstractmethod updateProject(projectID: str, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProjectUpdates, content: dict)¶

Change details of an project like its status.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – project ID that this project belongs to

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed project details

  • content (json dict) – changed project, can be many stuff

Returns:

Flag if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

abstractmethod deleteProject(projectID: str)¶

Delete specific project.

Parameters:

projectID (str) – unique project ID to be deleted

Returns:

Flag if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

abstractmethod getProjectsFlat(session)¶

Parameters:

session (dict) – session of that user

Returns:

sorted list with projects

Return type:

list

  • processID (str) – The ID of the process

processID (str) – unique process ID to be deleted

Flag if it worked or not

Bool

abstractmethod updateProcess(projectID: str, processID: str, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProcessUpdates, content: dict, updatedBy: str) → tuple[str, dict] | Exception¶

Change details of a process like its status, or save communication.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – Project that this process belongs to

  • processID (str) – unique processID to be edited

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed process details

  • content (json dict) – changed process, can be many stuff

  • updatedBy (str) – ID of the person who updated the process (for history)

Returns:

Content that is relevant to an event

Return type:

tuple[str,dict] | Exception

abstractmethod deleteFromProcess(projectID: str, processID: str, updateType: code_SemperKI.definitions.ProcessUpdates, content: dict, deletedBy: str)¶

Delete details of a process like its status, or content.

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – Project that this process belongs to

  • processID (str) – unique process ID to be edited

  • updateType (EnumUpdates) – changed process details

  • content (json dict) – deletions

  • deletedBy (str) – ID of the person who deleted from the process (for history)

Returns:

Flag if it worked or not

Return type:

Bool

abstractmethod getUserID() → str¶

Retrieve UserID from session

Returns:

UserID

Return type:

str

abstractmethod checkIfFilesAreRemote(projectID: str, processID: str) → bool¶

If at least one file is remote, say so to trigger upload to remote for new files as well

Parameters:

  • projectID (str) – The ID of the project that the process is part of

  • processID (str) – The ID of the process in question

Returns:

True if remote, false if local

Return type:

bool

abstractmethod getData(processID: str, processObj=None) → list¶

Get all data associated with the process (aka history).

Parameters:

processID (str) – process ID for a process

Returns:

list of all data

Return type:

list

abstractmethod createDataEntry(data, dataID, processID, typeOfData, createdBy: str, details={}, IDofData='')¶

Create an entry in the Data table

Parameters:

  • data (Dict in JSON) – The data itself

  • dataID (Str) – The ID of that date

  • processID (str) – process it belongs to

  • typeOfData (DataType) – The type of this data

  • createdBy (Str) – Who created it (hashed ID)

  • details (JSON Dict) – Some metadata

  • IDofData (Str) – If the data has an id, save it

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

None
